description:
@herbsovermeds
Did you know? #Tamarind 
👉🏽Directions: Measure out about 1/3 cup of tamarind pulp from a block, or 1/2 cup pulp from peeled, ripe tamarind pods. Place in a small bowl with 1 cup of warm water, and let it soften, squeezing and mashing it now and then to help it dissolve.
